医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有 COVID-19 的糖尿病患者：抗体水平低与预后较差相关抗 SARS-CoV-2 抗体水平对 T2D 患者 COVID-19 结局的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Diabetic-病人-with-COVID-19-low-antibody-levels-linked-to-worse-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Diabetic-病人-with-COVID-19-low-antibody-levels-linked-to-worse-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cf67fed-5ad5-447c-ba79-c29960f6fa7a Mon, 30 Oct 2023 08:01:00 -0400 Diabetic patients with COVID-19: low antibody levels linked to worse outcomes
爸爸们推动加州带薪家庭假计划的发展家庭平等日益增强的一个迹象是，越来越多的新爸爸要求带薪家庭假，以便在为人父母的最初几周内与孩子建立联系并支持他们的伴侣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Dads-drive-growth-in-Californiae28099s-paid-family-leave-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Dads-drive-growth-in-Californiae28099s-paid-family-leave-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a409e9ac-5012-4039-a88a-34ad03f21e53 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 07:53:04 -0400 Dads drive growth in California’s paid family leave program
根据最近的调查，日常使用止痛药不会降低同理心水平，但滥用可能会降低同理心水平一方面，低同理心和亲社会行为与镇痛药消耗之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Day-to-day-painkiller-use-doesnt-lower-empathy-levels-but-misuse-might-according-to-recent-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Day-to-day-painkiller-use-doesnt-lower-empathy-levels-but-misuse-might-according-to-recent-survey.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c6976ee-a4af-4a68-b24a-f26990c9f945 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 07:30:00 -0400 Day-to-day painkiller use doesn't lower empathy levels, but misuse might, according to recent survey
地中海饮食如何影响肥胖个体的胰岛素抵抗和敏感性？研究人员评估了肥胖个体对地中海饮食的坚持、胰岛素分泌、抵抗力和敏感性之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/How-does-the-Mediterranean-diet-impact-insulin-resistance-and-sensitivity-in-obese-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/How-does-the-Mediterranean-diet-impact-insulin-resistance-and-sensitivity-in-obese-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9483a8c3-c085-4210-94c1-8ff4f79467ba Mon, 30 Oct 2023 05:39:00 -0400 How does the Mediterranean diet impact insulin resistance and sensitivity in obese individuals?
经济实惠的空气质量监测揭示了农村儿童接触有害颗粒物的情况研究人员讨论低成本空气污染测量系统的开发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Affordable-air-quality-monitoring-reveals-rural-childrens-exposure-to-harmful-pativity-matter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Affordable-air-quality-monitoring-reveals-rural-childrens-exposure-to-harmful-pativity-matter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d64137e1-06ec-44c4-a93d-f76b5aa37356 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 05:34:00 -0400 Affordable air quality monitoring reveals rural children's exposure to harmful particulate matter
尽管全球禁止，但仍有 85% 的青少年接触过电子烟广告，吸电子烟的青少年数量猛增这项跨国研究表明，尽管有现有规定，四个国家 85% 的年轻人接触过电子烟广告。研究还发现，媒体曝光程度与青少年使用电子烟的可能性之间存在显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Youth-vaping-skyrockets-as-8525-are-expose-to-e-cig-ads-despite-global-bans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Youth-vaping-skyrockets-as-8525-are-expose-to-e-cig-ads-despite-global-bans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4588d8-b2ef-4e61-a514-4a75060b42e8 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 02:55:00 -0400 Youth vaping skyrockets as 85% are exposed to e-cig ads, despite global bans
注入辣木的无麸质酵母可以促进所有人的健康，尤其是乳糜泻患者研究人员开发了一种添加辣木的无麸质酵母面包，辣木是一种以其健康益处而闻名的非传统作物。研究发现，这种新颖的面包配方提供了更高的营养成分，包括更高水平的蛋白质和必需矿物质，使其成为乳糜泻患者和寻求更健康面包替代品的人的可行选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Moringa-infused-gluten-free-sourdough-offers-health-boost-for-all-special-celiacs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Moringa-infused-gluten-free-sourdough-offers-health-boost-for-all-special-celiacs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b6a524e-f565-42d5-87d5-ef04c01fc8da Mon, 30 Oct 2023 02:36:00 -0400 Moringa-infused gluten-free sourdough offers health boost for all, especially celiacs
SARS-CoV-2 抗原会持续存在：研究发现病毒标记可以持续一年多研究人员发现，SARS-CoV-2 抗原在初次感染后可在体内持续存在长达 14 个月，这对 COVID-19 是一种短暂性疾病的观点提出了挑战。这一发现对于了解病毒的长期影响具有重要意义，并可能影响未来的治疗和疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/SARS-CoV-2-antigens-stick-around-Study-finds-virus-markers-can-linger-for-over-a-year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/SARS-CoV-2-antigens-stick-around-Study-finds-virus-markers-can-linger-for-over-a-year.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d1a9e0b-be4a-4f82-a48d-c8ecd5886563 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 02:14:00 -0400 SARS-CoV-2 antigens stick around: Study finds virus markers can linger for over a year
新的荟萃分析显示，多吃鱼可能会增加患心脏病的风险最近发表在《营养》杂志上的一项荟萃​​分析发现，大量食用鱼类可以使心血管疾病的风险降低 8%。该研究还区分了富含 omega-3 的多脂鱼的好处和油炸鱼的潜在风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Eating-more-fish-could-reel-in-heart-disease-risks-new-meta-analysis-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Eating-more-fish-could-reel-in-heart-disease-risks-new-meta-analysis-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b679d6ec-00cf-49da-8129-995100d647d4 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 01:57:00 -0400 Eating more fish could reel in heart disease risks, new meta-analysis shows
解码大脑如何实时理解句子研究人员通过使用癫痫患者在阅读任务期间的颅内记录来检查大脑如何处理语言，揭示了负责语义整合和区分语义连贯性和基于任务的指涉性的神经网络。该研究精确定位了句子处理过程中激活的特定大脑区域，并为语言理解的时空动态提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231029/Decoding-how-the-brain-understands-sentences-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231029/Decoding-how-the-brain-understands-sentences-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3c471c6-c550-4bef-adee-6ef1bad2b051 Sun, 29 Oct 2023 21:59:00 -0400 Decoding how the brain understands sentences in real-time
